com.fortify.processrunner.processor

Class CompositeProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fortify.processrunner.processor.AbstractProcessor
      • com.fortify.processrunner.processor.AbstractCompositeProcessor
        • com.fortify.processrunner.processor.CompositeProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICLIOptionDefinitionProvider, IProcessor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CompositeOrderedProcessor

    public class CompositeProcessor
extends AbstractCompositeProcessor
    This IProcessor implementation allows a list of individual IProcessor instances to be configured using the constructor or addProcessors(IProcessor...) method. Based on functionality provided by AbstractCompositeProcessor, each of the configured processors will be invoked.
    Author:
    Ruud Senden

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.fortify.processrunner.processor.IProcessor

        IProcessor.Phase

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CompositeProcessor()
      Default constructor, allowing manual configuration of the list of IProcessor instances to be configured via the addProcessors(IProcessor...) method.
      CompositeProcessor(IProcessor... processors)
      This constructor allows configuring the list of IProcessor instances that make up this composite processor.
